params.data: Passes a flag for an initial creation event
params.from: The address sending the membership token
params.ids: An array of membership token ids to be transfered
params.operator: The address that initiated the action
params.to: The address recieveing the membership token

constructor.details: Will instantiate safe teller with gnosis master and proxy addresses

params._controllerRegistry: The address of the ControllerRegistry contract
params._memberToken: The address of the MemberToken contract

params._admin: The address of the pod admin
params._label: label hash of pod name (i.e labelhash('mypod'))
params._members: The addresses of the members of the pod
params.threshold: The number of members that are required to sign a transaction

createPodWithSafe(address,address,bytes3.details: Used to create a pod with an existing safeWill automatically distribute membership NFTs to current safe members

params._admin: The address of the pod admin
params._label: label hash of pod name (i.e labelhash('mypod'))

migratePodController(uint256,address,add.details: This will nullify all pod state on this controllerUpdate state on _newControllerUpdate controller to _newController in Safe and MemberToken

params._newController: The address of the new pod controller
params._podId: The id number of the pod
params._prevModule: The module that points to the orca module in the safe's ModuleManager linked list

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newAdmin: The address of the new pod admin
params._podId: The id number of the pod

updatePodState(uint256,address,address).details: This is called by another version of controller to migrate a pod to this versionWill only accept calls from registered controllersCan only be called once.

params._podAdmin: The address of the pod admin
params._podId: The id number of the pod
